remarks: Finite product closure lemma.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 14-Dec-2017.)
statement:
fprodcllem.1 $e |- ( ph -> S C_ CC ) $.
fprodcllem.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( x x. y ) e. S ) $.
fprodcllem.3 $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fprodcllem.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. S ) $.
fprodcl2lem.5 $e |- ( ph -> A =/= (/) ) $.
fprodcl2lem $p |- ( ph -> prod_ k e. A B e. S ) $.
$d A k x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d S k x y $.
$d k ph x y $.
